title: Game crashes on start
body: Whenever I finish Champ select and go into the game, my entire screen freezes. I can't move my cursor around, and the screen is just the first frame of the game. I am forced to manually restart my computer every time. I have reinstalled league many times, and i checked my graphics card and it is fine. Any tips on what to do?

replies.body: This issue has been happening to some players after a recent Windows 10 update, and it appears to be a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should fix this freezing issue!  Let me know if you have any questions.
